scripts.build-js: mkdir -p dist && browserify -t reactify lib/scripts/index.jsx -o dist/gamr.js
scripts.build-min-js: mkdir -p dist && browserify lib/scripts/index.jsx | uglifyjs -o dist/gamr.min.js
scripts.build-sass: mkdir -p dist && node-sass lib/styles/index.scss dist/gamr.css --include-path lib/styles
scripts.build-min-sass: mkdir -p dist && node-sass lib/styles/index.scss --include-path lib/styles | cleancss -o dist/gamr.min.css
scripts.watch-js: mkdir -p dist && nodemon -e js* -w lib/scripts -w stubs -x 'npm run build-js'
scripts.watch-sass: mkdir -p dist && nodemon -e scss -w lib/styles -x 'npm run build-sass'
scripts.build: npm run build-js & npm run build-sass
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-sass
